title: Mayor De Blasio Takes Heat As City Mourns Slain Police Officers
teaser: On Monday, New York Mayor Bill de Blasio spoke to an audience of police officers for the first time since the head of the city's largest police union said de Blasio had "blood on his hands" for the recent killing of two police officers.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
